casebody.data:
GLOVER
v.
The CHARLOTTE-MECKLENBURG HOSPITAL AUTHORITY, et al. 356P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2018 R. Kent Brown, Attorney at Law, Jon Ryan Moore, Attorney at Law, Paige L. Pahlke, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, John R. Taylor, Attorney at Law, Robert E. Zaytoun, Attorney at Law, Matthew D. Ballew, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Glover, Briana Washington, et al. John H. Beyer, Attorney at Law, Katherine H. Graham, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for The Charlotte-Mecklenburg Hospital Authority, et al.

Daniel N. Mullins, Attorney at Law, Durham.

William Conor Brockett, Associate General Counsel.

Phillip T. Jackson, Attorney at Law, Asheville, for N.C. Association of Defense Attorneys.

*559The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of November 2018 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of November 2018."
